list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the temporary release of an accused person awaiting trial, sometimes on condition that a sum of money be lodged to guarantee their appearance in court.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he has been released on bail
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ấy đã được phát hành tại Bail

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a bar on a typewriter or computer printer that holds the paper steady.
a fastening that secures a crampon to the sole of a boot.
a bar or pole separating horses in an open stable.
an arched handle, such as on a bucket or a teapot.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: drawers fitted with brass bail handles
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: ngăn kéo được trang bị tay cầm bằng đồng thau

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: either of the two crosspieces bridging the stumps, which the bowler and fielders try to dislodge with the ball to get the batsman out.
release or secure the release of (a prisoner) on payment of bail.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his son called home to get bailed out of jail
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Con trai anh gọi là nhà để được cứu trợ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: scoop water out of a boat or ship.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: when we started bailing, the boat was filled with water
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Khi chúng tôi bắt đầu bảo lãnh, chiếc thuyền chứa đầy nước
